collection.title: BPA-Free Plastic Bottles
collection.body_html: Lightweight, convenient, and trusted by parents everywhere. Our collection of plastic baby bottles are all guaranteed to be 100% free of BPA, BPS, and phthalates. We've curated the most innovative and ergonomically designed bottles that offer practicality without compromising on safety for your little one.

products.title: 240ML BPA-Free Anti-Colic Baby Bottle Wide-Neck PP Plastic
products.body_html:
Feeding time should be simple, but it often becomes messy and stressful without the right tools. Spilled milk, bottles that don't seal properly, and nipples that cause colic or gas can quickly frustrate both parent and child. The 240ML Baby Bottle changes that reality by offering a practical, safe, and comfortable feeding solution built to keep babies happy and parents stress-free.

Thoughtfully designed with both function and comfort in mind, the 240ML Baby Bottle provides an easy-to-hold structure, a natural nipple shape, and an anti-colic vent system. Its size is ideal for growing babies, while its lightweight and durable construction makes it just as convenient for home use as for travel. Parents can finally enjoy smoother feeding sessions without worrying about leaks or discomfort.




WHAT MAKES THE 240ML BABY BOTTLE DIFFERENT


✅ ANTI-COLIC TECHNOLOGY – Built with a venting system that prevents air intake, reducing gas and discomfort. Babies experience calmer, happier feeds, and parents enjoy more peaceful nights.

✅ SAFE & DURABLE MATERIAL—The 240ML baby bottle is made with BPA-free, high-quality plastic that resists wear and tear. Parents can trust it to last through daily use while keeping every feed safe.




✅ NATURAL NIPPLE DESIGN – Created to mimic breastfeeding, easing the transition between breast and bottle. This reduces feeding resistance and helps maintain a natural feeding rhythm.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN – The wide-mouth opening makes cleaning and sterilizing quick and thorough. Parents save valuable time while ensuring the 240ML Baby Bottle always remains hygienic.





✅ PERFECT SIZE FOR FEEDING – 240ML The bottle balances capacity and convenience, holding just the right amount for a growing baby. It's compact enough for diaper bags, making feeding on the go stress-free.



SIMPLE TO USE 240ML BABY BOTTLE


1. Fill the 240ML Baby Bottle with milk or formula.

2. Secure the leak-proof lid and nipple.

3. Feed your baby comfortably at home or on the go.

4. Clean with ease and reuse for the next feeding.


Research shows that over 65% of parents face daily feeding challenges like gas, bottle leakage, or nipple rejection. Without the 240ML Baby Bottle, these struggles lead to restless nights, wasted formula, and added frustration during an already busy routine.

Families using the 240ML Baby Bottle report smoother feeding sessions, less fussiness, and more time enjoying their baby instead of troubleshooting feeding issues. With its anti-colic design, natural nipple, and reliable build, this bottle gives parents peace of mind while making every meal a positive experience.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS


Material: BPA-free PP Plastic

Colors: Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green

Package Size: 180 x 110 x 60 mm

Care Instructions: Wash and disinfect before each use; store away from insects and bacteria in a sanitary place.



 

A Nestacular Promise

At Nestacular, we believe in the quality of our products, so we offer a 30-day Money-Back Guarantee, no questions asked! When you purchase from us, there is ZERO Risk for you!

Congratulations!

You've found a hidden discount code! Use code "TTD" at checkout to claim an additional 10% OFF your ENTIRE order!

 

Customer Support:

Email: support@nestacular.com

products.title: Aurelia Antibacterial Silicone Baby Bottle - Wide Mouth Nano Silver
products.body_html:
Aurelia Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle with Antibacterial Nano Silver Technology

Ensure safe and healthy feeding with the Aurelia Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle, designed with antibacterial nano silver technology for maximum hygiene. The wide-caliber design makes it easy to fill, clean, and use, while the soft, food-grade silicone ensures safety and comfort for your baby.

Perfect for weaning and everyday feeding, this innovative feeder helps protect against bacteria growth, making every mealtime safer. Its durable, lightweight, and heat-resistant build makes it ideal for both home and travel use.

Key Features:

  • Antibacterial Nano Silver: Inhibits bacterial growth for safe feeding.
  • Wide-Caliber Design: Easy to clean, fill, and handle.
  • Premium Silicone: BPA-free, non-toxic, and gentle on gums.
  • Durable & Heat-Resistant: Suitable for hot and cold liquids.
  • Perfect for Weaning: Helps transition toddlers to independent feeding.

Give your baby the safest feeding experience with the Aurelia Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle.

products.title: Bambiora BPA-Free Silicone Baby Straw Cup - Spill-Proof Toddler Bottle
products.body_html:
Bambiora Silicone Baby Drinking Cup with Straw – Safe, Spill-Free Toddler Learning

Make drinking fun and safe for your toddler with the Bambiora Silicone Baby Drinking Cup with Straw. Designed for easy learning and feeding, this cup features a soft silicone straw and a spill-proof, drop-proof design to prevent messes during mealtime or playtime.

Crafted from food-grade, BPA-free silicone, it's gentle on your toddler's gums and teeth while being durable enough for everyday use. Perfect for at home, daycare, or on the go, the Bambiora cup encourages independent drinking while keeping liquids safely contained.

Key Features:

  • Leak-Proof & Drop-Proof: Prevents spills and accidents during active play and learning
  • Soft Silicone Straw: Gentle on developing gums and easy for small hands to manage
  • Safe & Durable: BPA-free, non-toxic, food-grade materials for peace of mind
  • Ergonomic Design: Easy for toddlers to hold and carry independently
  • Portable & Convenient: Ideal for home, travel, or daycare use

products.title: SmileyTot Baby Feeding Tableware – Safe, Durable & Easy-to-Clean Toddler Dining Set for Everyday Use
products.body_html:
Make mealtime simple, safe, and fun with the SmileyTot Baby Feeding Tableware Set. Designed for infants and toddlers, this dining set includes durable and lightweight pieces that are perfect for everyday use.

Crafted from food-grade, BPA-free materials, it ensures safety with every bite. The smooth edges and easy-to-grip design help little ones learn self-feeding with confidence. Plus, its easy-to-clean, dishwasher-safe design makes mealtime stress-free for parents.

Whether it’s breakfast, lunch, or dinner, the SmileyTot Tableware Set is a must-have for your baby’s feeding journey.

2. Key Features

  • Complete toddler dining set for everyday meals

  • Made from safe, BPA-free, food-grade materials

  • Lightweight yet durable for long-lasting use

  • Smooth, baby-friendly edges for safe feeding

  • Dishwasher-safe and easy to clean

products.title: SnugBug Baby Fruit & Vegetable Feeder – Happy Nipple Silicone Teether for Infants
products.body_html:
Introduce your baby to fresh fruits and vegetables safely with the SnugBug Baby Fruit & Vegetable Feeder. Designed with a happy nipple silicone teether, it allows infants to enjoy soft foods without the risk of choking.

Made from BPA-free, food-grade silicone, the soft feeder is gentle on gums and easy for little hands to hold. Its secure locking system ensures safety while encouraging self-feeding and sensory development. Perfect for teething, introducing solids, or healthy snacking, the SnugBug feeder makes feeding fun, safe, and convenient.

Key Features:

  • Happy Nipple Silicone Teether: Safe introduction to fruits and vegetables.

  • BPA-Free & Safe: Non-toxic materials for infant use.

  • Anti-Choke Design: Reduces risk while eating solids.

  • Easy to Use & Clean: Detachable parts for hassle-free cleaning.

  • Portable & Fun: Perfect for home, travel, or daycare feeding.

Make self-feeding safe, healthy, and enjoyable with the SnugBug Baby Fruit & Vegetable Feeder.

products.title: Tiniq Duckbill Training Cup – PP Plastic Baby Water Bottle for Infants & Toddlers
products.body_html:
Make learning to drink easier with the Tiniq Duckbill Training Cup, specially designed for infants and toddlers. Made from safe, durable PP plastic, this baby water bottle features a soft duckbill spout that allows your little one to transition smoothly from breastfeeding or bottles to independent drinking.

The ergonomic handles make it easy for small hands to grip, while the lightweight and spill-resistant design ensures stress-free feeding at home or on-the-go. Perfect for water, milk, or juice, the Tiniq Training Cup helps babies develop healthy drinking habits with ease.

Key Features:

  • Duckbill Spout Design: Gentle on gums and supports easy drinking.

  • Safe PP Plastic: Non-toxic, BPA-free, and durable for daily use.

  • Easy-to-Grip Handles: Designed for small hands to hold comfortably.

  • Lightweight & Portable: Ideal for home, travel, or daycare.

  • Supports Self-Feeding: Helps infants and toddlers transition to cups.

Give your baby the perfect first step toward independent drinking with the Tiniq Duckbill Training Cup.
